name: Cinnamon Pull Apart Bread
steps: Mix in a large bowl and let rise for 15 minutes:
Blend well. Divie dough into 4 equal balls. On a floured surface roll out one ball until dough measures 16 x 12 inches.
Butter dough well and then sprinkle with a cinnamon.sugar mixture. If you like you break with lots of cinnamon add lots
to your sugar. Fold up a third of the dough and then lightly butter and then sprink with the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Fold up last section. Now cut into 10 equal pieces. Grease pan and sprinkle bottom with cinnamon/sugar mixture.
Put pieces into pan. Let rise 15 mintues. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes. Follow same procedure for remaining 3 balls.
After baking let cool a couple of minutes and frost if desired.
Frosting: 1/3 cup soft butter, 3 cups powdered sugar, 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla, and 2 T. milk.
